title: Am I the only one who remembers items through icons instead of item names?
body:
I've been playing league since 2014 in SEA and moved to OCE July 2015.
I've noticed that I don't remember all or most the item names but I know what to buy depending on the role or champ I use.
This has really affected me when I was using certain champions on different roles other than their meta role (e.g ziggs supp) or when icons were changed after patches.
I've only been able to recall item names like Infinity Edge or Iceborn Gauntlet until recently but I was already buying them since I began playing :)
I now know most of the item names because of experience but I would like to know if some other players have been like this or once like this.

replies.body: If i forget then i go to ingredient and work up.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GUoucjYq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-11T03:25:34.530+0000)
>
> If i forget then i go to ingredient and work up.

this.

I usually just go from basic items and move through the ingredients to bigger items because I find it faster than searching. Sometimes if I need a specific item I'll just straight up search its name instead of looking through everything else.

Also sometimes you can search for descriptions/keywords as well, like if you search for "Spooky Ghost" you'll get {{item:3092}}. It works in the boards item selection box as well apparently!

Oh! and you can search for stats like Magic Pen

As soon as we saw the FQC rework my friends and I loved summoning the spooky ghosts but then we found out everyone was saying it and our meme died. :[

i don't actually remember any item names...
i just buy them as the suggestion goes
My friends and I refer to Iceborn Gauntlet as "Ice Punchy Punchy". And we still call Morellonomicon "Big Book of Evil".
I dont forget the name of items often but i do give them stupid alternate versions eg sunflower cape, deathfire cap, randuins hurricane.

{{item:3036}} "The red arrow one with the health killing thing".

Yep. That's how I remember items :P

Mm I certainly remember them by icon as well, though I do know all the names now. I find the fastest way to find an item when you lose the name is to try and have rough ideas of their prices, then scroll through all items. I do that a lot for {{item:1058}} since it's not too far down and searching takes a while when I'm trying to watch the map as well.

Knowing the prices is also just a good idea in general since it helps you know when to go back ey :)
